WorkItem.Description: I'm sorry if the 3.2 patch changed all this with the dodge and parry rating change, but my Rawr is telling me to almost gem ALL my gear with dodge rating. I know avoidance is good and all, but with DR coming into play it'd be a loss. I optimize with full Thoroughness, and it still does it and the Optimized value is lower. My XML file is attached.

Comments.Message: I'm unable to load that character file, what version of Rawr are you using?

I wasn't clear, the file itself wasn't the problem, it looks like it had been created in a previous version of Rawr (before talent and glyph tree changes) so it wouldn't load into 2.2.14 (unreleased). I'm downloading the 2.2.13 release to try and load it and see what the problem is (if there is one).

leaving no requirements on the optimizer, max thor, override regem and override reenchant. I do see a couple of gems being moved to dodge and defense (or some split version of the gem).

Looking more closely, it appears that the optimizer is working gems SOLELY off of the Gemming templates, not by any form of actually selecting gems that are available. This could and probably is part of your problem.

Do you have custom gemming templates set and/or do you have any additional template selections active beyond "Rare"?
I have no custom Gemming templates, yet I do have the "Epic" template active.
Try marking which gems are available to the optimizer in the Gems -> Normal and Gems -> Meta section and see the difference.
I did that, and my optimization score is still about 800 lower than before. From 747172.6 to 746393.3 Overall Rating score. A slight improvement, yet still lowering it.
Then it's entirely possible that your current gear *is* the optimal setup and the optimizer isn't able to find a better set

The only problem I'm having is that since I started tanking I've been told and numbers have showed that Dodge rating is lower then others. It only started showing this gemming since 2.2.13. I'm just wondering if dodge rating is now higher than stam even with the lower % per rating, which doesn't make sense. I'm not going to pretend to know how Rawr is coded, I'm just wondering if this is intentional or a bug, since I've gotten used to using Rawr to get the best gems I can get for my new gear (like those 25 ToC pants) and it's all suddenly changed to dodge rating.
I found the problem. All my buffs got erased. I'm sorry for wasting your time. Now everything seems correct. Sorry!
